data.title: Arizona Christian University
data.meta_description: Explore Arizona Christian University reviews, rankings, and statistics. Is it the right college for you?
data.text:
View Event Description

This free, live webinar is your opportunity to engage directly with our expert team of Enrollment and Student Success Advisors. Why Register? Interactive Session: Have your questions answered in real-time by our admissions and support teams. Recording Available: A recording of the event will be sent out to all registrants, so you can revisit the information at your convenience. Who Should Attend? This event is perfect for prospective students who are considering online education and want to learn more about ACU’s unique approach to combining faith and learning in an online setting. Don’t miss out on the opportunity to learn more about advancing your education within a Christ-centered community. Reserve your spot today to be part of this informative session. Register now! Event Details: Duration: Approximately 45 minutes Location: Online (link provided upon registration)
